mapper.select: SELECT id, room_no, check_in, check_out, room_type, package_type, bed_type, exbed, meal, total_price, resv_date, member_id, hotel_category FROM resv_room WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
SELECT id, hotel_category, room_type, check_in FROM resv_room WHERE member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, room_no, DATE_FORMAT(check_in, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_in, DATE_FORMAT(check_out, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_out, room_type, package_type, exbed, meal, total_price, DATE_FORMAT(resv_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as resv_date, member_id, hotel_category FROM resv_room WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT room.id as id, room_no, check_in, check_out, room_type, bed_type, exbed, meal, total_price, resv_date, member_id, room.hotel_category as hotel_category, room_type, room_price FROM room LEFT JOIN resv_room ON room.id=resv_room.room_id AND resv_room.check_out >= #{checkIn}
WHERE room.hotel_category = #{hotelCate} AND resv_room.id IS NULL
